abstract.t: This document specifies a Management Information Base (MIB) for the Lightweight User Datagram Protocol (UDP-Lite, RFC 3828). It defines a set of new MIB entities to characterise the behaviour and performance of the transport layer entities using UDP-Lite. UDP-Lite resembles UDP (RFC 768), but differs from the semantics of UDP by the addition a single (socket) option. This adds the capability for variable-length data checksum coverage that can benefit a class of applications which prefer delivery of corrupted datagram payload data in preference to discarding the datagram.
